data.author: Dean Ornish

data.quote: Not everything that lowers HDL is bad for you. If you change from a high-fat, high-cholesterol diet to a healthy low-fat, low-cholesterol diet, your HDL levels may stay the same or even decrease because there is less need for it. When you have less garbage, you need fewer garbage trucks to remove it, so your body may make less HDL.
data.author: Dean Ornish

data.quote: If you go on a diet and feel constrained, you are more likely to drop it. But if you see your food choices each day as part of a spectrum, then you are more likely to feel free and empowered.
data.author: Dean Ornish

data.quote: Sometimes I've had to put myself on a diet.
data.author: Roger Moore

data.quote: My interesting diet tips are eat early and don't nosh between meals. I mean, I can pack it away.
data.author: Carol Burnett

data.quote: Mam was always saying we had a simple diet: tea and bread, bread and tea, a liquid and a solid, a balanced diet - what more do you need? Nobody got fat.
data.author: Frank McCourt

data.quote: For me, I just like to cut out bread. I like to keep the good carbs in my diet - I love pasta and Italian food - but I try to eat just that on the weekends and cut out carbs during the week.
data.author: Ashley Tisdale

data.quote: For so many years, I felt so insecure, so inferior, and I still have those moments, but I have a newfound confidence since I got in shape and changed my diet.
data.author: Marc Jacobs

data.quote: I love food - I am never on a diet - I swear to God!
data.author: Irina Shayk

data.quote: The key is to master a few simple ways to exercise that will burn the most calories in the least time. And you also need to figure out how can you eat more of the good stuff and less of the bad stuff without feeling deprived so your diet regimen feels manageable.
data.author: Jillian Michaels

data.quote: I had to get healthy for a period in my life, so I learned a lot about food and diet.
data.author: Cobie Smulders

data.quote: The big curse of America, to me, is skinless, boneless chicken breasts. They're banal and relatively flavorless. The rest of the world's trying to get some fat to eat, and we're trying to ban it from our diet.
data.author: Jim Harrison

data.quote: Polynesian women are known for their long hair, glowing skin, and thick nails. And that comes from the local diet, which is mostly plant based with a little bit of fish and a lot of natural fats and oils.
data.author: Nikki Reed

data.quote: My mom was always really healthy and cautious about her diet, so I'm not a big sugar guy.
data.author: Paul Walker

data.quote: I take care of myself, which includes dieting, exercising and minimising stress. I joke that I've been on a diet since 1974, which is basically true.
data.author: Kim Cattrall

data.quote: It's easy to diet or get off a diet when you've got a juicy role to play.
data.author: Kim Cattrall

data.quote: I try to stick to a certain diet all the time, and then when I feel like a reward, I have it. I try to stick to no dairy, no sugar, no wheat.
data.author: Paloma Faith

data.quote: I always ate healthy, but it wasn't scientific. Now it's a high-protein diet and no carbohydrates. I have more consistent energy, and I don't get tired after a meal. It does take a very detailed meal plan.
data.author: Lindsey Vonn

data.quote: I don't have a very good diet.
data.author: Margot Robbie

data.quote: I stagger out of bed, take the dogs outside, and then I'll get a Diet Coke and a couple of dog biscuits and go upstairs. By the time I've consumed my Diet Coke and had a quick run through the morning email and Twitter feed, I will probably be compos mentis enough to work.
data.author: Diana Gabaldon

data.quote: I'm kind of like a middle mix between a warrior diet and a Paleo diet, so I only eat once a day and it's at night - so kind of like interval fasting. But I eat until I'm full, I eat as much as I want, and I really don't eat anything that you couldn't find, you know, 10,000 years ago.
data.author: Ronda Rousey

data.quote: I go mainly by the Dolce diet. It is a little hard to describe: it's not really a diet but more of a lifestyle. I eat throughout the day; I have three meals and two snacks, and it changes according to what I need at the time.
data.author: Ronda Rousey

data.quote: I need my food to keep my energy up, so I can't really diet.
data.author: Sienna Miller

data.quote: Diet cola is my absolute favorite drink in the world; I used to drink four cans a day. But to help me cut down, I've turned it into a treat. Now, instead of having dessert, I'll have a can of diet soda. Putting a limit on how often I can drink it has helped me appreciate it more.
data.author: Kaley Cuoco

data.quote: My diet is mostly chicken and fish. I make sure I get a lot of vegetables, a lot of fruit. I am a big fruit man, I am a vegetable man anyway. And I also get a lot of rest. That's the key I may be up early, but I'm in bed early too.
data.author: Magic Johnson

data.quote: Keep your energy levels high by adding bananas and egg whites to your diet.
data.author: Nargis Fakhri

data.quote: My mother always wants me to put me on a diet.
data.author: Twinkle Khanna

data.quote: I don't really read non-fiction, but I have grown up on a steady diet of Wodehouse and, of course, science fiction.
data.author: Twinkle Khanna

data.quote: Weight Watchers is not intimidating. It's not a diet. It's a lifestyle.
data.author: Jessica Simpson

data.quote: I went to a nutritionist; my diet is pretty clean, but I wanted to get some more knowledge and understanding in some areas. My two favorite things, Clif Bars and lattes, she just destroyed in our first meeting. Coffee is fine, but soy is the most genetically modified food that we eat.
data.author: Andre Ward

data.quote: I don't think you can name one diet I haven't done.
data.author: Trisha Yearwood

data.quote: I think diet plays an important role before any beauty and skincare regime. Taking care of what you eat and drinking lots of water throughout the day always come first.
data.author: Disha Patani

data.quote: In money, and in life, you are very often your own worst enemy. You promise yourself you're going to diet, then eat not one or two French fries but a whole plate. You decide to really commit to saving for retirement, only to wind up with a new pair of shoes in your closet.
data.author: Jean Chatzky

data.quote: I am following a particular diet, and it requires me to not just eat right but also at the right time. So, I carry food from home.
data.author: Yami Gautam

data.quote: I love Spanish food. My diet is the Mediterranean diet, which is good food. I eat well.
data.author: Penelope Cruz

data.quote: My parents have been incredibly supportive from perhaps the first real independent decision I made to become a vegetarian at 11, which was certainly not consistent with their diet at the time.
data.author: Chelsea Clinton

data.quote: My training diet can be quite strict when I'm coming up to competition; it's a weight-making sport, of course. But I eat quite healthily anyway, and it's less strict when out of competition.
data.author: Katie Taylor

data.quote: I'm well trained. The only reason I am this slim is that I have to fit into the clothes. The samples are size 8, and I am naturally a size 10 to 12. I have been on a diet for my entire life.
data.author: Marie Helvin

data.quote: The hardest diet I was ever on was the one when I was fat. You can only wear fat clothes, you don't feel good, your sex life gets damaged, you don't have energy for anything. It's horrible.
data.author: Drew Carey

data.quote: Neither am I on an extreme diet nor am I on an extreme workout.
data.author: Jacqueline Fernandez

data.quote: I naturally favour a clean, healthy diet. A salad sandwich is one of my favourite meals!
data.author: Victoria Pendleton

data.quote: Literary readings aren't going to shake their reputation as the added-fibre of our entertainment diet until the people who organize and participate in them snap out of this mentality.
data.author: Lynn Coady

data.quote: If you're going to choose to do something like the Paleo Diet, then you choose not to enjoy your nights out.
data.author: Chrissy Teigen

data.quote: I love meat and vegetables. If I did a diet, I would do Paleo, except they have no cheese, which is very upsetting. I'm going to start my own Chrissy diet that's like Paleo plus cheese. Plus late Saturday night drive-through.
data.author: Chrissy Teigen

data.quote: Cutting meat out of your diet is the best thing you can do for animals and your own health.
data.author: Joan Jett

data.quote: For the vast majority of those who are obese - those with a Body Mass Index over 30 - their size is their choice. They choose to take in more calories than they burn. They choose to take in high fat calories over low-fat ones. They choose to fad diet, if they choose to diet at all.
data.author: John Ridley

data.quote: I absolutely relate to being alone in squalor, trying to come up with something adequate. I relate to that, and I've been known to crawl out of bed and drink out of a 2-liter bottle of Diet Coke.
data.author: Diablo Cody

data.quote: I definitely try to eat a healthy diet, but I am the first person to say I love unhealthy food. I would never tell you I don't. I love fried chicken or mac and cheese. Do I order them all the time when I'm out at restaurants? No, though I do have one splurge meal a week.
data.author: Rachel Nichols

data.quote: It was when my American coach Dan Pfaff came over from the States in 2009 and started working with me that we really began to look at my diet. He decided I was eating too many carbohydrates, so I cut back on bread. Over the next year I lost weight and became leaner.
data.author: Greg Rutherford

data.quote: I got sick of trying everything. I tried every single thing imaginable - diet, exercise. I even bought a house on the health spa property, and I still gained weight.
data.author: Lisa Lampanelli

data.quote: I started modeling at 28. I'm 5-feet-7 1/2, and I never went on a diet. I followed what my doctor told me: 'It's good to have a little bit of fat. Your weight is fine. Don't go any lighter.'
data.author: Isabella Rossellini

data.quote: Although Shanghai is on the sea, it long lacked the prosperity that Hong Kong enjoyed, so while Hong Kong became known for its exotic ocean creatures, Shanghai built its diet around more commonplace river and sea fish.
data.author: Evan Osnos

data.quote: I try not to diet because it never really works for me, if I tell myself I can't eat something then I tend to want to eat everything in sight.
data.author: Leona Lewis

data.quote: Reminded of what a diet really is, I began eating more slowly, being more conscious of when I was full. I started to enjoy my buckwheat bread with goat cheese and pureed butternut-squash soup as a response to real hunger.
data.author: Kate Christensen

data.quote: Diet Coke is the only way I get through filming because I get so tired.
data.author: Lily James

data.quote: I'm terrible with my workout regime and following it strictly. I'm terrible with a healthy diet and following it strictly. I'm terrible on the weekends about getting up at reasonable hours and all of those things. But, when it comes to my work and the discipline it takes to get to work on time - I hate unprofessionalism.
data.author: Katherine Heigl

data.quote: After my experiences with the 5:2 diet, I wasn't interested in a short-term fix that would fail later. I wanted a way of eating that made me lose weight without feeling deprived.
data.author: Kate Christensen

data.quote: Famously cancer fighting, laden with vitamins, minerals, soluble fiber, and phytonutrients, broccoli and its relatives are among the healthiest ingredients of the human diet.
data.author: Kate Christensen

data.quote: I used to be hung up on my figure, but it's a waste of time. I don't believe in diets. Have four pints one night, be healthy the next.
data.author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

data.quote: I have something called endometriosis, and I was told by my gynecologist that I needed to go on a specific diet if I didn't want to have any more surgery.
data.author: Tia Mowry

data.quote: I saw how changing my diet really benefitted my health. After I changed my diet, I was able to get pregnant, and then my eczema went away, and then my migraines went away.
data.author: Tia Mowry
